segments.text: I observe the woman standing there, drying dishes as usual.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is full, and water is spilling over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea her foot is in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is grabbing cookies secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister reaches up, hoping for one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me sad thinking about what could go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is neat and serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, it's all about to unravel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies might not be worth the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for the family if something breaks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage will be hard to fix.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This peaceful scene hides so much potential heartbreak.
segments.speaker: PAR
